safire.data.filters.positional_filters module¶

Implements functions that filter out certain words or sentences from an array of sentences parsed from a vertical text file.

Each function here takes as the first argument the sentences array and some optional keyword arguments.

safire.data.filters.positional_filters.first_k(sentences, k=None)[source]¶

Retain only the first K sentences.

safire.data.filters.positional_filters.first_p(sentences, p)[source]¶

Retain only the given fraction of sentences from the beginning. (Rounds up, for single-sentence documents.)

safire.data.filters.positional_filters.words_from_first_k(sentences, k)[source]¶

Retain only words that occur in the first K sentences.

safire.data.filters.positional_filters.words_from_first_p(sentences, p)[source]¶

Retain only words that occur in the given fraction of sentences from the beginning.
